item.description:
Come see the Aerosmith tribute band "Draw the Line" aboard Bay State Cruises' 1100 passenger vessel on Saturday night to dance and party the night away. The Music Cruises are limited to Adults 21 or more years of age. All Music Cruises begin and end at our Boston Docks.


Tickets are $25 and available on-line at http://www.baystatecr...
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet to the left of the pier near the bar.
item.why: Because it always a good time with us !!

group.name: Boston/Burbs Life after Divorce Social Group

item.name: Boston Harbor Cruise - Aerosmith tribute band
